mapper.select: select d.id as id, c.name as name,u.nickname as nickname, c.release_price as releasePrice, c.price as price, d.title as title, i.src as src from deal as d, car as c, user as u, img as i where d.car = c.id and d.seller=u.id and d.id = i.deal <if test="name!='없음'"> and c.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') </if> <if test="year1!=-1 and yaer2!=-1"> and #{year1} <= c.year and c.year <=#{year2} </if> <if test="year1==-1 and yaer2!=-1"> and 0 <= c.year and c.year <=#{year2} </if> <if test="year1!=-1 and yaer2==-1"> and #{year1} <= c.year and c.year <= 10000 </if> <if test="year1==-1 and yaer2==-1"> and 0 <= c.year and c.year <= 10000 </if> <if test="cc!=-1"> and c.cc <= #{cc} </if> <if test="distance!=-1"> and c.distance <= #{distance} </if> <if test="color!='없음'"> and c.color = #{color} </if> <if test="gear!='없음'"> and c.gear = #{gear} </if> <if test="fuel!='없음'"> and c.fuel = #{fuel} </if> <if test="seat!=-1"> and c.seat <= #{seat} </if> <if test="flooding!=-1"> and c.flooding <= #{flooding} </if> <if test="insurance!=-1"> and c.insurance <= #{insurance} </if> <if test="releasePrice!=-1"> and c.release_price <= #{releasePrice} </if> <if test="price!=-1"> and c.price <= #{price} </if> group by d.id
